doc:
Cyril Ring https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyril_Ring 0 Cyril Ring (December 5, 1892 – July 17, 1967) was an American film actor. He began his career in silent films in 1921. By the time of his final performance in 1951, he had appeared in over 350 films, almost all in small and/or uncredited parts. He is probably best known today for his role as Harvey Yates, a con artist and accomplice to fellow con artist Penelope, played by Kay Francis in the Marx Brothers first film The Cocoanuts (1929). He also appeared in uncredited small parts in the Marxes' third film, Monkey Business (1931) and their seventh film, A Day at the Races (1937). Cyril_Ring ( December_5_,_1892 – July_17_,_1967 ) was an_American_film_actor . He began his_career in silent_films in 1921 . By the_time of his_final_performance in 1951 , he had_appeared in over_350_films , almost_all in small_and/or_uncredited_parts . He also appeared in uncredited_small_parts in the_Marxes '_third_film , Monkey_Business_(_1931_) and their_seventh_film , A_Day at the_Races_(_1937_) .
